title: In my opinion, this one of Croatia's best ever world cup goals.

author: kungfu_panda_express
text: I thoroughly enjoyed watching Croatia play in the cup. The intensity was fantastic and it showed in final third play.

author: aensly
text: Your team got packed by hrvatska lmao

author: Exotic-Advantage7329
text: Everyone is you and your family?

author: kungfu_panda_express
text: I try not to focus on the penalties that much,  because there is so much acting in general.
